abstract: Moldovan police detain 13 suspected members of separatist paramilitary group that is believed to have been planning attacks on cities of Chisinau and Balti.
lead_paragraph: The Moldovan police said Thursday that they had detained 13 people suspected of being members of a paramilitary group accused of planning to attack cities.

headline.print_headline: Europe; Moldova: 13 Accused of Plotting Attacks

snippet: The Moldovan police said Thursday that they had detained 13 people suspected of being members of a paramilitary group accused of planning to attack cities.
